armor.name: Adamantine
armor.properties: Grants damage reduction based on armor category.

armor.name: Arandur
armor.properties: Grants sonic resistance.

armor.name: Astral Driftmetal
armor.properties: Effective against incorporeal attacks as if made of force. Only a breastplate, shield, or heavy armor can be made from this material.

armor.name: Aurorum
armor.properties: Restores itself if sundered.

armor.name: Blended Quartz
armor.properties: Reduces arcane spell failure chance.

armor.name: Blueice
armor.properties: Reduces armor category, armor check penalty, and arcane spell failure (for cold spells) and increases maximum Dexterity bonus.

armor.name: Bronzewood
armor.properties: Reduces weight, doesn't affect hide in woodlands.

armor.name: Camoflauge Dye
armor.properties: Grants a hide bonus (only with specific light armors).

armor.name: Chitin
armor.properties: Replaces metal, increases maximum Dexterity bonus.

armor.name: Copper, Alchemical
armor.properties: Grants cold resistance.

armor.name: Cyrite (Arcane Steel)
armor.properties: Grants a +1 resistance bonus to saves.

armor.name: Darkleaf, Elven
armor.properties: Reduces arcane spell failure, armor check penalty, armor category and increases maximum Dexterity bonus.

armor.name: Darksteel
armor.properties: Grants acid resistance.

armor.name: Darkwood (Zalantar)
armor.properties: Reduces weight and armor check penalty (shields only).

armor.name: Dlarun
armor.properties: Grants fire resistance.

armor.name: Dragoncraft Armor/Shield
armor.properties: Grants energy resistance 5 against the respective dragon as an extraordinary ability. Reduces armor category and armor check penalty, only available for certain armor types.

armor.name: Dragonhide
armor.properties: Replaces metal to craft most armors. Immune to the breath weapon of the respective dragon species (armor only).

armor.name: Dragonhide Mantle
armor.properties: Grants energy resistance as dragoncraft armor, but uses the shoulder body slot.

armor.name: Duskwood
armor.properties: Breastplate only; reduces armor category, arcane spell failure and armor check penalty, increases maximum Dexterity bonus.

armor.name: Elukian Clay
armor.properties: Increases armor check penalty, does not apply armor check penalty to swim.

armor.name: Entropium
armor.properties: Increases armor category and Strength armor check penalty, reduces Dexterity armor check penalty, arcane spell failure and increase maximum Dexterity bonus.

armor.name: Fever Iron
armor.properties: Grants fire resistance.

armor.name: Flametouched Iron
armor.properties: Grants a saving throw bonus vs. evil outsider spells, spell-like and supernatural abilities.

armor.name: Glassteel
armor.properties: Reduces armor category, armor check penalty and arcane spell failure, increases maximum Dexterity bonus.

armor.name: Gold, Alchemical
armor.properties: Grants fire and acid resistance, increases armor category, armor check penalty and arcane spell failure, decreases maximum Dexterity bonus.

armor.name: Leafweave, Elven
armor.properties: Reduces arcane spell failure and armor check penalty, increases maximum Dexterity bonus, cannot replace metal armors.

armor.name: Living Metal
armor.properties: Reduces armor check penalty and arcane spell failure, increases maximum Dexterity bonus.

armor.name: Mithral
armor.properties: Reduces armor category, armor check penalty and arcane spell failure, raises maximum Dexterity bonus.

armor.name: Mournlode, Purple
armor.properties: Resistance bonus vs. the spells, spell-like and supernatural abilities of undead.

armor.name: Platinum, Alchemical
armor.properties: Grants cold and sonic resistance, increases armor category, armor check penalty and arcane spell failure, decreases maximum Dexterity bonus.

armor.name: Riverine
armor.properties: Half the armor bonus becomes deflection (see misc. for more properties).

armor.name: Sentira
armor.properties: Replicates mithral, required to craft emotional armor (emotional armor has some pretty decent bonuses. All three are published in the same book: Calming, Dreadful, and Vengeful).

armor.name: Shadowsilk
armor.properties: Can only be used to make certain light armors, grants a bonus to hide/move silently, increases maximum Dexterity bonus, reduces armor check penalty and arcane spell failure (in shadows/darkness).

armor.name: Starmetal
armor.properties: Replicates adamantine.

armor.name: Susalian Chainweave
armor.properties: Grants damage reduction /piercing.

armor.name: Thistledown
armor.properties: Used for padded armor, provides a bonus to hide checks in shadowy/dark areas.

armor.name: Urdrukar (mindsteel)
armor.properties: Increases the DC vs. scrying on the wearer, doubles arcane spell failure.

armor.name: Wildwood
armor.properties: Reduces the AC bonus, armor check penalty and arcane spell failure, increases maximum Dexterity bonus and has no armor check penalty when used to hide in undergrowth. Wildwood heals itself if soaked in water or while in sunlight.

armor.name: Ysgardian Heartwire
armor.properties: Increases AC vs. crit confirms.

misc.name: Blueice
misc.properties: Weighs half as much as metal, maintains a freezing temperature.

misc.name: Bluewood
misc.properties: Items weigh half, not effective for weapons.

misc.name: Darkwood (Zalantar)
misc.properties: Reduces the weight of wooden items by half.

misc.name: Densewood
misc.properties: Increases weight and the break DC of the item.

misc.name: Dragonshard
misc.properties: Grants special abilities, usually crafted to make wondrous items.

misc.name: Dwarvencraft
misc.properties: Increases an items hp, hardness, and break DC (this modifies a material, similar to a template).

misc.name: Flametouched Iron
misc.properties: Increases your effective level for turning.

misc.name: Livewood
misc.properties: Allows the item to be affected by most spells that affect living plants.

misc.name: Mithral
misc.properties: Reduces the weight of an item by half.

misc.name: Mournlode, Purple
misc.properties: Damages undead when used as a holy symbol for turning.

misc.name: Riverine
misc.properties: Invulnerable to physical damage, susceptible to certain dispelling effects.

misc.name: Soarwood
misc.properties: Increases the speed of a boat or ship.

weaponry.name: Abyssal Bloodiron
weaponry.properties: Replicates cold iron, bonus to confirm crits.

weaponry.name: Adamantine
weaponry.properties: Bypasses /adamantine damage reduction, ignores hardness 20 and below when used to sunder items.

weaponry.name: Aurorum
weaponry.properties: Restores itself if sundered.

weaponry.name: Baatorian Green Steel
weaponry.properties: Enhancement bonus to damage.

weaponry.name: Blueice
weaponry.properties: Slashing weapons deal bonus damage.

weaponry.name: Bronzewood
weaponry.properties: Reduces weight.

weaponry.name: Byeshk
weaponry.properties: Deals bonus damage with bludgeoning weapons, bypasses the damage reduction of daelkyr.

weaponry.name: Calomal
weaponry.properties: Overcomes the damage reduction of creatures with the fire subtype.

weaponry.name: Crystal, Deep
weaponry.properties: Deals bonus damage by channeling power points.

weaponry.name: Cyrite (Arcane Steel)
weaponry.properties: Bypasses /magic damage reduction.

weaponry.name: Darksteel
weaponry.properties: Deals bonus electricity damage.

weaponry.name: Dlarun
weaponry.properties: Deals bonus frost damage.

weaponry.name: Dragonbone Bow
weaponry.properties: Increases the range by 20' and makes the bow composite.

weaponry.name: Dragonfang
weaponry.properties: Grants an enhancement bonus to attacks and energy damage of the respective dragon as an extraordinary ability.

weaponry.name: Duskwood
weaponry.properties: Steel weapons weigh half as much.

weaponry.name: Fever Iron
weaponry.properties: Deals bonus fire damage.

weaponry.name: Flametouched Iron
weaponry.properties: Weapon is considered good-aligned.

weaponry.name: Frystalline
weaponry.properties: Weapon is considered good-aligned.

weaponry.name: Gehennan Moghuth-Iron
weaponry.properties: Penalty to attack and damage, but naturally poisonous.

weaponry.name: Glassteel
weaponry.properties: Makes hidden weapons harder to spot.

weaponry.name: Gold, Alchemical
weaponry.properties: Increases the damage dice of a weapon. Makes a weapon 'heavy' and requires exotic weapon proficiency to wield.

weaponry.name: Hizagkuur
weaponry.properties: Deals bonus electricity damage.

weaponry.name: Iron, Cold
weaponry.properties: Bypasses /cold iron damage reduction.

weaponry.name: Kheferu
weaponry.properties: Bypasses the damage reduction of creatures with the earth subtype.

weaponry.name: Mournlode, Purple
weaponry.properties: Overcomes undead damage reduction as silver or cold iron.

weaponry.name: Pandemonic Silver
weaponry.properties: Replicates silver, creates a 30 ft. aura of fear when unsheathed in windy conditions.

weaponry.name: Pearlsteel
weaponry.properties: Reduces the penalties of using a weapon underwater.

weaponry.name: Platinum, Alchemical
weaponry.properties: Increases the damage dice of a weapon. Makes a weapon 'heavy' and requires exotic weapon proficiency to wield.

weaponry.name: Riedran Crysteel
weaponry.properties: Deals bonus damage to psionic creatures.

weaponry.name: Rimefire Ice
weaponry.properties: Deals bonus cold damage.

weaponry.name: Silver, Alchemical
weaponry.properties: Bypasses /silver damage reduction, reduces weapon damage.

weaponry.name: Serren
weaponry.properties: Adds the ghost touched property.

weaponry.name: Solarian Truesteel
weaponry.properties: Bonus to confirm crits.

weaponry.name: Starmetal
weaponry.properties: Replicates adamantine, but deals extra damage to extraplanar creatures.

weaponry.name: Stygian Ice
weaponry.properties: Chance to break when dealing damage, deals bonus cold damage and chance to deal WIS damage on hit.

weaponry.name: Targath
weaponry.properties: Overcomes the damage reduction of Aerenal deathless, reduces attack and damage.

weaponry.name: Thinaun
weaponry.properties: Absorbs the souls of those who die while touching the weapon, and prevents their resurrection unless the caster has the weapon at hand.

gems.name: Amaratha
gems.properties: Increases caster level for energy resist spells.

gems.name: Diamond
gems.properties: Increases caster level for healing spells.

gems.name: Jasmal
gems.properties: Increases caster level for spells that provide enhancements to armaments.

gems.name: Orl
gems.properties: Enhances chaotic descriptors and spells that provide luck bonuses.

templates.name: Feycraft (Armor)
templates.properties: Reduces weight and arcane spell failure, grants a bonus to bluff checks.

templates.name: Fireshaped (Armor)
templates.properties: Bonus to saves vs. fire and heat effects.

templates.name: Fireshaped (Weapon)
templates.properties: Deals bonus damage to creatures with the cold subtype.

templates.name: Githcraft (Armor)
templates.properties: Reduces arcane spell failure, grants a bonus to concentration checks.

templates.name: Githcraft (Weapon)
templates.properties: Deals bonus damage to psionic creatures.

templates.name: Hellforged (Armor)
templates.properties: Increases armor check penalty and arcane spell failure, reduces maximum Dexterity bonus, grants bonus AC while adjacent to an ally.

templates.name: Hellforged (Weapon)
templates.properties: Deals bonus damage to targets that are flanked.

templates.name: Soulforged (Armor)
templates.properties: Bonus to resist bullrushes or trip attempts.

templates.name: Soulforged (Weapon)
templates.properties: Bonus damage against a charging foe.

templates.name: Dwarvencraft
templates.properties: Increases an items hp, hardness, and break DC (this modifies a material, similar to a template).
